snippet: Records show that the chief executive of Star Scientific gave Kenneth T. Cuccinelli II, a candidate for governor and a former owner of stock in the company, thousands of dollars worth of gifts.
abstract: Virginia Atty Gen Kenneth T Cuccinelli II, Republican candidate for governor, faces scrutiny for his ties to Star Scientific chief executive Jonnie R Williams Sr, who is at center of exploding political drama in Virginia as state and federal investigators look into lavish gifts he gave to Gov Bob McDonnell; reports show that Cuccinelli received $18,000 in gifts from Williams while owning stock in the company.
lead_paragraph: Records show that the chief executive of Star Scientific gave Kenneth T. Cuccinelli II, a candidate for governor and a former owner of stock in the company, thousands of dollars worth of gifts.

headline.main: Virginia’s Attorney General Faces Scrutiny for Ties to Executive
headline.print_headline: Virginia’s Attorney General Faces Scrutiny for Ties to Executive
